name: responseBodyV1
desc: The response body containing JSON data that the App Store sends in a version 1 server notification.

items.name: auto_renew_adam_id
items.desc: An identifier that App Store Connect generates and the App Store uses to uniquely identify the auto-renewable subscription that the user’s subscription renews. Treat this value as a 64-bit integer.

items.name: auto_renew_product_id
items.desc: The product identifier of the auto-renewable subscription that the user’s subscription renews.

items.name: auto_renew_status
items.desc: The current renewal status for an auto-renewable subscription product. Note that these values are the strings “true” and “false”, and not the strings “0” or “1” that appear in auto_renew_status in the receipt.

items.name: auto_renew_status_change_date
items.desc: The time at which the user turned on or off the renewal status for an auto-renewable subscription, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601 standard.

items.name: auto_renew_status_change_date_ms
items.desc: The time at which the user turned on or off the renewal status for an auto-renewable subscription, in UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. Use this time format to process dates.

items.name: auto_renew_status_change_date_pst
items.desc: The time at which the user turned on or off the renewal status for an auto-renewable subscription, in Pacific Standard Time.

items.name: bid
items.desc: A string that contains the app bundle ID.

items.name: bvrs
items.desc: A string that contains the app bundle version.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The environment for which the App Store generated the receipt.

items.name: expiration_intent
items.desc: The reason a subscription expired. This field is only present for an expired auto-renewable subscription. See expiration_intent for more information.

items.name: notification_type
items.desc: The subscription event that triggered the notification. See notification_type for the complete list of version 1 notification types.

items.name: original_transaction_id
items.desc: The original transaction identifier for which App Store Server Notifications sends the notification.

items.name: password
items.desc: The same value as the shared secret you submit in the password field of the App Store Receipt requestBody when validating receipts.

items.name: unified_receipt
items.desc: An object that contains information about the most recent in-app purchase transactions for the app.
